```{r}
#| echo: false

r_file_as_code <- function(file){
  code <- readLines(file) |> 
  paste0(collapse = "\n")

paste0(
  '<div class="sourceCode">
<pre class="downlit sourceCode r code-with-copy">
<code class="sourceCode R">
',
  code,
  '</code></pre></div>'
) |> 
  cat()
}
```
